summary: An industry trained Electrician/Operations Technician with extensive experience within three diverse industries. Excellent interpersonal skills combined with a proven record of working to tight deadlines with a flexible attitude to work. A confident decision maker with a conscientious approach to all aspects of asset operations and maintenance.

I also review permits / isolations both process and electrical and look for potential conflicts in work scopes. I am also responsible for carrying out competency assessments on technicians for both electrical competencies and P Vision competencies.

While performing the CRO role my duties included maintaining a control room log, carry out process optimization using a DCS (Yokogawa), controlling platform overrides both process and fire and gas, raising process permits/isolations, supervising operation technicians ensuring the work activities are carried out safely and efficiently.
